channel.title: Mattilyn Mattroe's musical shenanigans
channel.description:
Hi, figured I'd create a thread to post my videos to...
Here's the latest:
https://youtu.be/BETdifH_g74
It's 3 axoloti's and a guitar. 1 guitar loop throughout, going through 3 sequenced factotums, a delay and a reverb, and an axoloti drum machine. Entirely sequenced in the axolotis.

item.title: Mattilyn Mattroe's musical shenanigans
item.dc:creator: @MattilynMattroe
item.description:
@MattilynMattroe wrote:

And here's my latest (figured I'd better actually make some music with my new patches...)

It's mostly axoloti - I used my note repeat sequencer/synth for the plucky synth, the pad is a subtractive synth I patched, drums are my axoloti drum machine. The bass is a bass-station 2, that and the pads were arranged in my Ableton-style midi Looper. Axoloti fx. My latest factotum patch is on the pad in the second half of the song, but pretty subtle. Then I did a quick mix in Ableton using a little eq and compression. Enjoy!

And just to bring the songs into one thread, here's the one I posted before-

Read full topic
